com.deprez

Class Community

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deprez.Community

  • public class Community
extends java.lang.Object
    The Community class manages the list of User plain java objects. It can sort the list and change anything about the list.
    See Also:
    User

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns the index if found, otherwise returns -1.

      • partition

        private int partition(java.util.List<User> userList,
                      int leftPtr,
                      int rightPtr,
                      User pivot)
        Partitions the List of User objects to divide and conquer the list
        Parameters:
        userList - the users reference
        leftPtr - the pointer to the left side of the partition
        rightPtr - the pointer to the right side of the partition
        pivot - the pivot point, in which the left and right list items positions are swapped
        Returns:
        returns the leftPtr position as the new pivot point
        See Also:
        quickSort(), quickSort(List, int, int), nameBinarySearch(String), Collection, Collections

      • nameBinarySearch

        private int nameBinarySearch(java.lang.String userName)
        Returns the index of the userName, assumes the list is sorted by User userName
        Parameters:
        userName - the userName to search for
        Returns:
        the index of the userName, returns -1 if not found.
        See Also:
        quickSort(), quickSort(List, int, int), partition(List, int, int, User), Collection, Collections
